description: Introduction and Background After my last article, Meta Orion AR Glasses (Pt. 1 Waveguides), I got to thinking that the only other diffractive grating waveguide I have seen with a 2-D (X-Y) expansion and exit gratings, used in Meta’s Orion, was from Wave Optics (purchased by Snap in May 2021) The unique look of Wave […]
title: Meta Orion AR (Pt. 2 Orion vs Wave Optics/Snap and Magic Leap Waveguides)
